adjectives.description: minimal (comparative more minimal, superlative most minimal)

entries.meaning: The smallest possible amount, quantity, or degree.
examples: With minimal effort, you won't be able to achieve all your dreams.

entries.meaning: (art) Characterised by the use of simple form or structures.
(music) Characterised by the repetition and gradual alteration of short phrases.
Something very small; a tiny part or fragment.
examples: […]  we seek in explaining mental phenomena and behavior always the "minimals," the little fragments of association, on which the mind is (passively) supposed to be based.
